section.54: The Book of Tribulations and Portents of the Last Hour

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ï·º) as saying:Hasten in performing these good deeds (before these) six things (happen): (the appearance) of the Dajjal, the smoke, the beast of the earth, the rising of the sun from the west, the general turmoil (leading to large-scale massacre) and death of masses and individuals
